data.eml:eml: Waidelotinae, a new subfamily of Pyrochroidae (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea) from Baltic amber of the Sambian peninsula and the interpretation of Sambian amber stratigraphy, age and location

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bukejs, Andris, Alekseev, Vitalii I., Pollock, Darren A. (2019): Waidelotinae, a new subfamily of Pyrochroidae (Coleoptera: Tenebrionoidea) from Baltic amber of the Sambian peninsula and the interpretation of Sambian amber stratigraphy, age and location. Zootaxa 4664 (2): 261-273, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.2.8
